name: praxis
description: Modular CSS framework built on top of the large and robust Axis CSS utility library and Stylus.
author: Alejandro Iglesias

scripts.build: stylus praxis/index.styl --out dist/praxis.css --use ./node_modules/axis --use ./node_modules/poststylus --with "['lost']" && stylus praxis/index.styl --compress --out dist/praxis.min.css --use ./node_modules/axis --use ./node_modules/poststylus --with "['lost']"
scripts.start: browser-sync start --server docs/ --files="docs/dist/*, docs/assets/*, docs/*.html" & stylus praxis/index.styl --watch -o docs/dist/praxis.css --use ./node_modules/axis --use ./node_modules/poststylus --with "['lost']"
